code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function PortfolioPage(){const projects=[{name:"E-commerce SEO Boost",result:"Increased organic traffic by 250% in 3 months",description:"We implemented keyword optimization, technical SEO fixes, and backlink strategies for a growing online fashion store."},{name:"Local Business Social Campaign",result:"Gained 1,500+ local followers and 200+ leads in 2 months",description:"Designed and managed Instagram and Facebook ad campaigns for a fitness center in Hyderabad."},{name:"Website Redesign for SaaS Startup",result:"Reduced bounce rate by 40% and improved conversions",description:"Delivered a clean, fast, mobile-first website using React, improving the UX and brand trust."}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"relative min-h-screen w-full overflow-hidden",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"absolute inset-0 bg-cover bg-center blur-sm",style:{backgroundImage:"url('/assets/portfolio.jpg')"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"relative z-10 px-6 py-10 max-w-6xl mx-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-4xl sm:text-5xl font-bold text-center underline mb-4",style:{color:"#FDFD96"},children:"Our Portfolio"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-center text-white text-lg sm:text-xl mb-10",children:"A few highlights of the projects we've delivered successfully."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-6",children:projects.map((project,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6 bg-white bg-opacity-90 shadow-md rounded-xl border",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-semibold text-blue-500 mb-2",children:project.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-700 italic mb-2",children:project.result}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600",children:project.description})]},idx))})]})]});}
